channel.title: Phil's Data Science Portfolio - Phil Bingham
channel.description: A collection of data science/machine learning notebooks and anything else that I find interesting.

item.title: Iris EDA & Classification
item.description: A short exploration and model building exercise in Python using the classic Iris data. Libraries used: Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn, matplotlib & seaborn.
item.dc:creator: Phil Bingham
